Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook

Class Notebook

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook.Notebook
public class Notebook extends Object
Notebook class; Contains an ISortedList of TaskLists, one ActiveTaskList, an AbstractTaskList for the currentTaskList, a notebookName, and boolean flag that keeps track of if the Notebook has been changed since the last save.
Author:
mhgausi, ojain

  • Constructor Details

    • Notebook

      public Notebook(String notebookName)
      Constructor for a Notebook with the given name. The taskLists field is constructed as a SortedList and the activeTaskList is constructed and is set to the currentTaskList. isChanged is initialized to true. An IAE is thrown if the notebookName is null, empty, or matches ACTIVE_TASKS_NAME.
      Parameters:
      notebookName - name of notebook
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for invalid notebookName

    • addTaskList

      public void addTaskList(TaskList taskList)
      Adds TaskList to notebook
      Parameters:
      taskList - TaskList being added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name of the new TaskList matches an existing one

      Parameters:
      taskListName - name of TaskList

    • removeTaskList

      public void removeTaskList()
      Removes the currentTaskList and then set to the activeTaskList. isChanged is updated to true.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the currentTaskList is the activeTaskList

    • addTask

      public void addTask(Task task)
      Adds task to currentTaskList
      Parameters:
      task - Task being added

    • editTask

      public void editTask(int idx, String taskName, String taskDescription, boolean recurring, boolean active)
      Edits the Task if the currentTaskList is a TaskList.
      Parameters:
      idx - index of task being edited
      taskName - name of task
      taskDescription - description of task
      recurring - boolean whether task is recurring
      active - boolean whether task is active
